description.text: #ylt#p#ygt# The NoiseOperator can be used to add controlled noise or noisy feature to your data set. That is especially useful in order to estimate the performance of a feature preprocessing or the robustness of a specific learner. #ylt#/p#ygt# #ylt#p#ygt# RapidMiner also provides many other preprocessing operators including a TFIDF filter, obfuscating, value series handling and more. #ylt#/p#ygt#
